# AUDIO::SET_ANIMAL_MOOD

## Summary
Sets an animals mood

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex: Index of the animal you want to change
* **AUD_ANIMAL_MOOD** mood: Member of the AUD_ANIMAL_MOOD enum above

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
mood can be 0 or 1 (it's not a boolean value!). Effects audio of the animal.
